name: umbrelOS 1.0
notes:
umbrelOS 1.0 brings a ground-up rebuild with a host of new features, a completely revamped architecture, and a brand new interface.

Learn more: https://link.umbrel.com/os

- Raspberry Pi users: Please follow the instructions here - https://link.umbrel.com/pi-update

- Umbrel Home users: You're ready to update now by clicking the 'Install Now' button below.

- Linux users: Please follow the instructions here - https://link.umbrel.com/linux-update

Note: Updates may overwrite any custom CLI scripts, files, packages, or settings (eg. WiFi) that you've manually installed or modified via command-line (SSH).

What's new:

- New UI: A visually stunning environment with seamless navigation, intuitive interactions, and a home screen you can personalize with widgets

- Search (âŒ˜K / Ctrl + K): Instantly find system settings, apps, or initiate actions with a simple keyboard shortcut.

- Quick Actions: Interact with apps and system settings faster than ever with right-click shortcuts.

- Architectural Overhaul: Re-engineered system for better stability, speed, and simplicity. umbrelOS 1.0 now sends device type information during the update check to ensure customized updates for different devices.

- Live Usage: Stay informed with live updates on your device's storage, memory, and CPU usage.

- Multilingual Support: Choose from 8 different system languages.
